players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I think we should all share our thoughts on Diana's death to figure out who's suspicious."
Bob: "This is terrible about Diana. Alice, I agree we need to work together. Did anyone notice anything unusual yesterday before the game started?"
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and discovered he's the mafioso. We should vote him out today!"
Bob: "Charlie, that's a very convenient claim to make when you can't prove it. If you were really the detective, why would you reveal yourself so early and become an easy target?"
You: "Charlie, your claim against Bob is bold. Why reveal so early when it puts you at risk?"
Charlie: "I stand by my investigation—Bob is the mafioso. Alice, we can't risk another night; let's vote him out to save ourselves."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
